/update-vm-nic-basic-info.description: Used for updating the basic information of a virtual machine NIC. This part of the information changes more frequently than other types, but requires VMTools support. There might be bugs if VMTools is not installed or running.

/update-vm-nic-advance-info.description: Used for updating the infrequently changed data in the virtual machine NIC. The nic_id can only be updated when the NIC model is set to SR-IOV. Additionally, updating the NIC model is not supported.
